snippet: The anti-hunger agency of the United Nations said that it had averted a suspension of aid to 440,000 Syrian refugees in Jordan after the United States gave $65 million.
abstract: United States gives $65 million to United Nations World Food Program, avoiding stoppage of relief to Syrian refugees in Jordan.
lead_paragraph: The anti-hunger agency of the United Nations said that it had averted a suspension of aid to 440,000 Syrian refugees in Jordan after the United States gave $65 million.

headline.print_headline: United Nations; Food Program Gets Emergency Cash
